# /workflow-status — Show all active tasks and their pipeline state

Display a summary of all active workflow tasks, their current agent stage, and any blockers.

## Steps

1. Read `{config:paths.handoffs}` from project-config.yaml
2. Scan all task directories for status.json files
3. For each task, display:

```
═══ Workflow Status ═══

TASK-001 (EBATT-007 — IEEE 485 Calculator)
  Status: active
  Pipeline: planner ✓ → builder ✓ → [reviewer] → tester → deployer
  Current: reviewer (started 12 min ago)
  Last handoff: 02-builder-to-reviewer.json

TASK-002 (EBATT-016 — Hydrogen Venting Viz)
  Status: blocked
  Pipeline: planner ✓ → [builder] → reviewer → tester
  Current: builder (blocked)
  Blocker: "Needs 3D library decision — see handoff notes"

Summary: 2 tasks (1 active, 1 blocked)
═══════════════════════
```

## Completed Tasks

Include recently completed tasks (last 7 days) with a `[done]` marker and total duration.

## No Active Tasks

If no tasks found:
```
No active workflow tasks.
Start one with: /workflow-start TASK-ID
```
